layer.origins_backgrounds.background.mis: You do not have a background.
origin.origins_backgrounds.acolyte.descr: Acolytes have had training from Clerics and have great faith.
origin.origins_backgrounds.acolyte.name: Acolyte
origin.origins_backgrounds.athlete.descr: Athletes have trained their bodies to perfection.
origin.origins_backgrounds.athlete.name: Athlete
origin.origins_backgrounds.coalminer.des: All the ores of the underground need to be mined, not just coal.
origin.origins_backgrounds.cryptkeeper.d: Tending the graves of the dead is hard work when they don't stay put.
origin.origins_backgrounds.cultist.descr: Cultists serve their gods in mysterious ways.
origin.origins_backgrounds.cultist.name: Cultist
origin.origins_backgrounds.farmhand.desc: They spent time working on someone else's farm.
origin.origins_backgrounds.farmhand.name: Farmhand
origin.origins_backgrounds.fisher.descri: Fishers have learned the art of fishing.
origin.origins_backgrounds.fisher.name: Fisher
origin.origins_backgrounds.fresh_face.de: They havent done anything of note. Yet.
origin.origins_backgrounds.guard.descrip: Protecting others and their valuables has taught them to protect themselves as well.
origin.origins_backgrounds.guard.name: Guard
origin.origins_backgrounds.haunted.descr: No strangers to darkness and tragedy, the Haunted carry their trauma silently. Usually.
origin.origins_backgrounds.haunted.name: Haunted
origin.origins_backgrounds.novice_mage.d: Novices began training under a Wizard's tutelage.
origin.origins_backgrounds.pirate.descri: Their only love is the sea. And emeralds. Lots of emeralds.
origin.origins_backgrounds.pirate.name: Pirate
origin.origins_backgrounds.retainer.desc: Continuing the family tradition of serving a Lord or Knight.
origin.origins_backgrounds.retainer.name: Retainer
origin.origins_backgrounds.sailor.descri: Sailors spend too much time swabbing the deck.
origin.origins_backgrounds.sailor.name: Sailor
origin.origins_backgrounds.scribe.descri: The hand cramps go away eventually.
origin.origins_backgrounds.scribe.name: Scribe
origin.origins_backgrounds.soldier.descr: The rank and file of the Lord's Army.
origin.origins_backgrounds.soldier.name: Soldier
power.origins_backgrounds.attack_in_ocea: When on the sea, your attacks are twice as fast.
You gain more Nutrition from eating cooked fish. (Does not show with AppleSkin)
power.origins_backgrounds.eyepatch.descr: Wearing an eyepatch on the open seas allows you to keep your Night Vision.
power.origins_backgrounds.eyepatch.name: Eyepatch
power.origins_backgrounds.faster_speed.d: Your ground movement is increased by 10%.
power.origins_backgrounds.graves.descrip: Your knowledge of the dead allows you to inflict 5% more damage to the Undead.
power.origins_backgrounds.graves.name: Back to your Crypts
power.origins_backgrounds.hello_darkness: You are immune to the darkness effect.
power.origins_backgrounds.improved_heali: Healing has 10% greater effect for you.
power.origins_backgrounds.legacy_sword.d: You carry your family's sword. It was your father's, and his mother's and...
power.origins_backgrounds.paperbacks.des: After transcribing so many books, you only need three paper to bind one.
power.origins_backgrounds.potion_food.de: You've ingested so many potions they are now nutritious and Healing.
power.origins_backgrounds.sacrifice.desc: Sacrificing chickens to your master gives you double Experience.
power.origins_backgrounds.sacrifice.name: Sacrificial Fowl
power.origins_backgrounds.shield_prowess: While using a shield, you gain Resistance I.
Your practice with a sword allows you to do 5% extra damage while wielding one.
power.origins_backgrounds.trusty_hoe.des: You have an enchanted Iron Hoe that was passed down through generations.
